item.title: Ex-husband indicted by grand jury in slaying of couple found in their Ohio home
item.description: An Ohio grand jury indicted a man in the double homicide of his ex-wife and her husband who were killed in their home last month

item.title: Man found guilty of involuntary manslaughter in 2001 death of San Francisco Thai grandfather
item.description: A 24-year-old man has been found guilty of involuntary manslaughter in the death of an elderly Thai man in San Francisco
